thread.title: Rishikesh in late August / early Sept
thread.title_full: Rishikesh in late August / early Sept

author: Titirangi
title: Rishikesh in late August / early Sept
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Titirangi Hi, We are a group of 4 adults and 5 children (aged 5-10 years) wanting to visit the Ganges & are planning late August / beginning Sept to visit Rishikesh. Will the rains be light enough by then that we can get out and about sightseeing with 5 children in tow? We don't want to be confined to a hotel or the children will be bouncing off the walls! Thanking you It could rain....unpredictable...but the bulk of the monsoons should be over by then. Relatively, a good time.
